name: ProductCatalogVersionParameterRel
comment: Maintains default values and other characteristics for a specific property of a given catalog item.
vf short description: Maintains default values and other characteristics for a specific property of a given catalog item.

column.name: ProductCatalogVersionParameterRelSK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: ValidFromDate
column.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

column.name: ValidUntilDate
column.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

column.name: KeyTypeId
column.comment: Key type of record

column.name: ProductCatalogVersionParameterRelKey
column.comment: Uniquely identifies the relationship between product catalog and product parameter at a specific time.

column.name: ProductCatalogVersionSK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: EffectiveDate
column.comment: Indicates the effective date of the relationship between product catalog items.

column.name: ProductParameterSK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: EndDate
column.comment: Indicates the end date of the relationship between product catalog items parameters.

column.name: DefaultValue
column.comment: Indicates the default value for a property of a given catalog item.

column.name: CurrentFlag
column.comment: Indicates whether the relationship between product catalog version and related parameters is currently active.Values are:- 1 - The relationship is currently active.- 0 - The relationship is currently not active.

column.name: PropertyId
column.comment: Identifies the product property in the source system.

column.name: ProductCatalogId
column.comment: Identifies the product catalog item in the source system.

column.name: ProductCatalogSK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: SourceSystemId
column.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

column.name: DeleteIndicator
column.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

column.name: RowUpdateTime
column.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

column.name: SourceUpdateTime
column.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

column.name: SourceQueryTime
column.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

column.name: DptiId
column.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

column.name: PTime
column.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

column.name: Insert_Load_Id
column.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

column.name: Update_Load_Id
column.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
